channel.title: November 2025 on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in November 2025 on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: ai: What’s new in Microsoft Foundry | October and November 2025
item.description:
Azure AI Foundry has been renamed Microsoft Foundry. The October–November 2025 update highlights new announcements across agents, models, tools, and related platform improvements.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: vscode: November 2025 Insiders (version 1.107)
item.description:
This article summarizes what’s new in the Visual Studio Code November 2025 Release (Insiders build v1.107) and invites readers to read the full release notes for details.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio — November update
item.description:
The November 2025 update for GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio announced the general availability of Visual Studio 2026, added new Copilot actions integrated into the IDE, and rolled out additional improvements; full details are in the GitHub Blog changelog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Secret scanning updates — November 2025
item.description:
GitHub Secret Scanning received updates in November 2025 that added support for 24 new secret types via new provider patterns; details were published in the GitHub Blog changelog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for November 2025
item.description:
Public preview announced in November 2025: the MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code adds an interactive Edit Data interface that lets you view, modify, and insert table rows without manually writing T-SQL, improving data editing workflows for Azure SQL.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for November 2025
item.description:
November 2025 Azure SQL update (Generally Available): reservation discounts for 1-year and 3-year reservations now apply to zone-redundant Azure SQL Managed Instances in the General Purpose tier; the notice indicates the discount covers both standard compute and additional compute option(s) (source content truncated).

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: dotnet: .NET and .NET Framework November 2025 servicing releases updates
item.description:
A brief recap of the November 2025 servicing updates for .NET and .NET Framework, published on the .NET Blog.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: security: ​​Securing our future: November 2025 progress report on Microsoft’s Secure Future Initiative ​​
item.description:
Microsoft published a November 2025 progress report for its Secure Future Initiative, reporting steady progress across all areas and engineering pillars. The initiative’s mission is to accelerate innovation, strengthen resilience, and lead the industry toward a safer digital future, with the report underscoring Microsoft’s continued commitment to security.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: github: New releases for GitHub Actions – November 2025
item.description:
GitHub increased limits for reusable workflows in GitHub Actions (November 2025): workflows can now nest up to 10 reusable workflows and a single workflow run can call up to 50 workflows in total.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Upcoming removal of Copilot premium request $0 budgets for enterprise and team accounts
item.description:
Starting November 18, 2025, GitHub will remove all $0 Copilot premium request budgets for enterprise and team accounts that were created before August 22, 2025.

  • Source: GitHub
